    • Constructor Detail

      • Palindrome

        public Palindrome(java.lang.String[] arguments)
        The constructor deletes the textPalindrome and retrieves array of arguments.
        Parameters:
        arguments - Contains all the words of the entered sentence in the form of a string array.

    • Method Detail

      • createString

        private void createString()
        Joins the texts contained in array textPalindrome and save in joinedTextPalindrome.

      • checkString

        private boolean checkString()
        Checks whether the combined words are palindromes.
        Returns:
        return true when joinedTextPalindrome have the same characters from front and back or otherwise false.

      • showfinalresult

        public boolean showfinalresult()
                        throws PalindromeException
        Checked result method checkString and if length of the string is equals 0 then throw exception.
        Returns:
        Return true or false. If string is palindrome return true otherwise false.
        Throws:
        PalindromeException - An exception occurs when the length of the string is equal to 0
